titles.title: Keeping Families Safe from Wildfire Smoke Act
Keeping Families Safe from Wildfire Smoke Act
To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to include wildfire smoke in the definition of major disaster.

bill.summary:
Keeping Families Safe from Wildfire Smoke Act
This bill explicitly authorizes the President to declare that a major disaster exists when wildfire smoke causes damage sufficient to warrant federal major disaster assistance.
